content: {"name": "Ethos Covenant House Caf\u00e9", "alternate_name": "", "description": "For more information or to register to attend a Community Cafe near you, please call 617-477-6688 or email ethosmeals@ethocare.org.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.ethocare.org/services/nutrition/community-cafes/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "30 Washington Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Commonwealth", "state_province": "MA", "postal_code": "02135", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.3428796, "longitude": -71.14209}, "phones": [{"number": "(617) 477-6688", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "20:45", "closes_at": "22:15"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "20:45", "closes_at": "22:15"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Seniors Only"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
